data.text:
@psaviousa 2/1 
We always strive to improve our service so any feedback is welcome. We would appreciate if you could fill in the form available online for any remark or comment. Thank you!
@psaviousa 1/1 Hi Piero, Spazio Italia Bar is up and running and the payment form is cashless to ease both crew processes on board as well as to ensure a frictionless passengers' experience.

🎇At midnight, there's only one wish we want to make: may you all fly high! ✨🎆

Happy New Year from #AirDolomiti ✈️ https://t.co/sQDP1Yo6hD

data.text: @psaviousa 2/1 products so we have extended our menu with fresh products and snacks to accommodate the needs of our passengers.
@psaviousa 1/1 Good morning, our in-flight service is fee-based and will now allow each passenger to choose from a wide range of Italian

This year, we've turned 30, but we have more energy than ever. Our first flight in the morning departs at 6.15am and our last flight comes in at 10.55pm ✈️
We're ready to reach our next milestone 🌟
To you and to us, a huge THANK YOU 30 times over 💙
#FlyingHighSince1991 #AdAstra https://t.co/qFDlp7Ril1

There's a way to feel almost like a #pilot, even if only for a day. 
How? With video games, of course 🕹️
Anyone who thinks it's just a #game, though, is sadly mistaken: this is what real pilots do. On the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/R4lSihBZoc https://t.co/HSmn21VgsS

@JuBaggio1899 Dear JuBaggio,
we are very pleased that your child is playing with our mini-plane! Happy to have you on board and happy to be able to make you dream even more 😇 #AdAstra #AirDolomiti

A frying pan 🍳 can't necessarily make a difference, but the hand that lifts it can make something unique.
It's time to put your tray table down and make room for JRE's haute cuisine ⭐
It's time to savour the creations of SpazioItaliaBar!
#SpazioItaliaBar #AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/XoEABusuT7

@Backflip25 Thank you very much Bryan, the passion for this job and feeling the passengers close to us pushes us to give our best! 😇
We wish you all the best for the new year, and look forward to seeing you on board! ✈️

data.text:
Things you need to know before flying: #6
You can get rid of excess weight 🤸

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nSw3MrhV8B

@AnkeDeMasi Your daughter is really smart 😍
The dual function of our sickness bag, with a clever design to stay perfectly positioned in case of any need 😉

Things you need to know before flying: #5
These are the only two masks allowed at this time of year 🎅

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/qwwmebfb17
@psaviousa To journeys and passengers like you, Piero and teddy bear: cheers to everyone! 💙 Buone Feste 🥂🥂
@josemanzella Thank you, and Merry Christmas to you too! 🎄

Things you need to know before flying: #4
On board, you can drink more than 100ml of good wine 🥂, since we're driving! 😉

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nC5dTy0jjd

data.text: @josemanzella A dive into the past 😍 thank you Josè!

If a child asks 'How do #aeroplanes fly?', you can't simply answer with the formula 'P=1/2 ρ V2 S Cp'... We help you to find the right response on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/QHM3Ps6tLD https://t.co/ArFhOxYNGd

Things you need to know before flying: #3
At times, you may unbuckle your (seat)belt! 😉

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/c1npwnkKCD

Rules for Christmas: rule #2
Watch out for your suitca... oops, your presents! 👀🎁

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/xeSBzMh68g

Things you need to know before flying: #1
Christmas is a fantastic journey - enjoy every single moment 📲 
✨ Merry Christmas! 

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nq80JiTMj5

From today, you'll have access to a new service on board our planes.
Welcome to SpazioItaliaBar! 🥂
A new way to enjoy Italian quality at high altitude, just for you 💙

#SpazioItaliaBar #AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/elhXt1p8ZJ

Meet Mattia, a captain who loves greeting passengers and who talks about the exciting Christmas present he got from Air Dolomiti one year. 
💙 https://t.co/YnvbDE3ecx
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/NRBV5tM4HZ

The festive season is about to take off 🌟 and whatever altitude you're at, from up at 30,000 feet, we're sending you our best wishes! 🎄

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/SUUtthA35h

There's something magical in the air! ✨
Father Christmas, Santa Claus 🎅 or Saint Nicholas: what do you call him in your house?
From our cockpit, we hope to grant little Giovanni's wish 🎁💙

#WeCare #WeWishYouAMerryFlight #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/4IvNNQUZNB

The longest porticoes in the world – a mere heartbeat away! 💙
Wander along 40 kilometres of arched walkways and take in the bustle of Bologna 👉 https://t.co/XgrwLmTSEH

#AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/XHevNIs9B2
@sabilovestweet wow Sabi, this picture is wonderful!!!
@weatherman747 Our first choice would be our excellent wines, but let's see what we can do about the Diet Coke 😉 see you on board! ✈️

data.text:
Do you want to change up the route of your morning run? 💨 How about moving it to #Aarhus Ø, the sustainable waterfront neighbourhood of #Denmark's second city? Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Photopop - VisitAarhus https://t.co/K0FRgSWbbu
@weatherman747 Hello Weatherman, if there's anything we can do just let us know! // Best regards

Over the past few months, you told us how much you missed our in-flight service 🍽️ in #EconomyClass.
It's now time for the #countdown to begin!
A new in-flight service is here and it's not only high-altitude but also high Italian quality  🇮🇹 
👉 https://t.co/P0ZbO7QtjC https://t.co/Oag9VXNuTF
@agphunter 📸✈️😍
@sabilovestweet You are more than welcome! 💙✈️

Even the smallest of gestures can make a difference for a better world 🌎 
Our employees wanted to donate clothes they no longer wear to give them a second life with Ronda della Carità in Verona.
Thank you, Ronda, for warming the hearts of those in need 💙
#WeCare #AirDolomiti https://t.co/s4C6DWjsrG

data.text:
What's your favourite #windowview? ✈️
Today, this is ours 😉

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/JtR1qsLcMz

📖 This is the #story of what a young woman achieved at a time when no-one would have imagined such a feat was even possible. Today's #AirDolomitiBlog article is a #tribute to Amy Johnson and all our female readers. 
👉 https://t.co/sBcid2Md8r https://t.co/s4J3JSFgxI

How about a walk through Frankfurt's historic city centre? 
We love it 😍

#Frankfurt #AirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/9f2phQAdXB

Today is World Kindness Day 🌸
Let's all make a #promise to ourselves and to each other: to #comment with kind words.
Kindness is contagious 😍 and it makes people smile!
We can all give the gift of #kindness together, today and always 💙
#bekind

data.text:
Renaissance splendour at its best – a mere heartbeat away! 😍
Let us whisk you off from Munich and Frankfurt to #Florence, where you’ll discover what inspired Galileo, Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo and Raffael 📸  https://t.co/PF6s0bwdCL https://t.co/IugBGHRYLp

urls.title: Florence attractions: travel guide to the city | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: A complete travel guide to the main attractions of Florence, in Italy. Discover what to do, what to see and where to eat in Florence on Air Dolomiti website. Read our articles and discover where to go around in the city center and its surroundings: visit the city like a local and make your trip unforgettable.

data.text:
Shall we have a competition to see who can see the most tail numbers? Just one of many things a plane #spotter might say to a fellow spotter. 
Find out more about this hobby with us on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/lsuPgOE6vX https://t.co/nwKyLIOvAk
@ekane79 Dear Eoghan O'Cathain, we wrote to you in DM. Thank you for contacting us!

🏆🏆
Our airline is awarded for our environmental commitment! 🍃
Air Dolomiti has won the EMAS 2021 Awards 🌍 assigned by ISPRA, Italian Institute for Environmental Protection and Research. 
For further information 👉 https://t.co/otvV4gWhIC https://t.co/bR3WmH7uvi

annotations.normalized_text: Italian Institute for Environmental Protection and Research

data.text: Each of their conquests was won through the struggle for equality: the female aviators of the past were brave and talented pioneers. The story of Margot Duhalde today on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/dYxiF7effl https://t.co/QxnRXXiAmH

Arianna talks about her curiosity, using hand gestures even when she's not working and the job that always keeps a smile on her face.
💙 https://t.co/wJmKev1vXP
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/CB4oa19trZ
@sangeet15916933 Dear Sangeeta, glad to hear that your luggage has been found. It has been a pleasure for us to assist you, and we remain at your complete disposal.
Germany’s most stunning skyline – a mere heartbeat away! Only Frankfurt offers the perfect blend of skyscrapers and traditional architecture 🌇 👉 https://t.co/AOYJaZGWkN https://t.co/NBo9E37Nbd
We could perhaps all do with a flight director to keep us on track in life. Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we talk about what pilots use them for 👉 https://t.co/h4uOR2cU14 https://t.co/Jj5APGBYzU

Just outside #Denmark's second city #Aarhus the "Infinite Bridge" invites for endless walks and beautiful sunsets. Who would you take there? 🌅
Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr
© Niels Povlsgaard & Johan Gjødes 📸 Sofie Lykke Olesen https://t.co/xVnymGJNuD
@sangeet15916933 Dear Sangeeta, we are checking your file. Plase write us a private message so we can verify together all the details. Thank you for your cooperation.
@sangeet15916933 Dear Sangeeta, we are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Could you please write us a private message? For privacy reason, we can't provide all details in a comment. Thank you.

Where dreams of chocolate 🍫 become a reality – a mere heartbeat away! 
Fly with us from Munich and Frankfurt to the chocolate capital, Turin, and indulge in gianduiotti, nocciolati, tartuffi and cri cri 😍
👉 https://t.co/VII4nEpkOJ https://t.co/cNDRe9vm10
@passarinic ..hope you are on this aircraft then! 😍
@Verona_arg Never say never 😎

Time for a makeover! ✂️
We are excited to debut our brand-new seats 💺 that offer unmatched comfort to our passengers while staying true to the iconic Italian elegance. 
Just sit back and get comfy! 💙
More details 👉 https://t.co/paQLMg0arx
#AdAstra #AirDolomiti #WeCare https://t.co/WO6umgN4I9
@h_broadhurst Hi Hannah, this is exactly the answer we were waiting for 🎉 we are happy you found your shopping bag! Enjoy your day 😊

@1GeorgeMorrison Hello George, we always strive to make our passengers' journey as pleasant as possible, so any remark is welcome. We'd like to inform you that the on-board music is in the process of being changed. Have a nice day ahead 🛫
@h_broadhurst Hi Hannah, this is exactly the answer we were waiting for 🎉 we are happy you found your shopping bag! Enjoy your day 😊
@h_broadhurst Hello Hanna, thanks for your message. We're sorry to hear about your lost property. Please get in contact with MAN Airport first, by using their online form: https://t.co/KbA04gbdQi

urls.title: Lost Property and Lost Luggage | Manchester Airport
urls.description: Information about what to do if your luggage is lost when travelling through Manchester Airport, or if you've lost something at the airport.

data.text: Before a trip, you need to get your smartphone ready... Have you got enough free storage space? Check out our favourite apps on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/ZCFxy34fza https://t.co/EZTtXUJ1cA

Looking up at the sky when you hear a plane is a fascination that never leaves you, even when you work in the industry for 20 years.
